sentences.english: In a word, numerous factors contribute to the global character of Jia Pingwa's literary works.
sentences.chinese: 多种因素构成了贾平凹创作中的世界性因素。

sentences.english: Jia's Shaanxi Opera expresses a hopeless spiritual return to the hometown.
sentences.chinese: 贾平凹的《秦腔》正表达了这种无望的精神回乡。

sentences.english: Jia Pingwa is one of the most famous prose writers with artistic talent and characteristics in the modern literary world.
sentences.chinese: 贾平凹是当代文坛最具艺术才华与特点的散文家。

sentences.english: The contradictory conflict between the city and countryside is always the object that Jia Pingwa pays attention to.
sentences.chinese: 城乡之间的矛盾冲突一直是贾平凹重点关注的对象。

sentences.english: Jia Ping Wa is best to express modern humanity, and it is also the focus that he creates.
sentences.chinese: 对现代人性的挖掘与表达是贾平凹创作的焦点。
